title: (x) Results logo - Myriad, Impact {Lex}
content:
![](http://web.archive.org/web/20080706224252im_/http:/www.typophile.com/files/results_6439.gif)

Been browsing through some fonts to match it up, but I am not having much luck.

Thanks for you time and effort guys/gals :)

 [‹ (x) Pike Modern Art Gallery wide sans logo - Runway {Ignacio}](http://web.archive.org/web/20080706224252/http:/www.typophile.com/node/30534 "Go to previous forum topic") [(x) The new sounds of Swedish techno, electro and house - ITC Avant Garde Gothic {Pieter} ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20080706224252/http:/www.typophile.com/node/30555 "Go to next forum topic")
author: retoid

comments.content:
Looks like [Myriad Black Condensed](http://web.archive.org/web/20080706224252/http:/www.fontshop.com/index.cfm?fuseaction=catalog.fontdetail&displayfontid=M.125553.0.0&attributes.sampleSize=48&sampleText=esults&sampleSize=48), with an ’R’ modified from [Impact](http://web.archive.org/web/20080706224252/http:/www.fontshop.com/index.cfm?fuseaction=catalog.fontdetail&displayfontid=LH.108001.0.1&attributes.sampleSize=48&sampleText=R&sampleSize=48).

- Lex
